author: Paul & Jessica

review: I got this for all the TVs in my house and use it daily. I have a Roku and a Smart TV, but I find myself using this more as the interface of apps like Netflix and Hulu are quicker to navigate when using my phone.New apps are being added at a respectable pace and I am excited for future possibilities.There are full Android devices that you can use that offer more functionality like web browsing and running Android apps, but if that extra functionality is something that you won't use then you'll find yourself spending more time trying to do what the Chromecast can do in seconds.The price is just icing on the cake, it can't really be beat for what it offers.
